pages.text: Welcome to Hermit home designer, You can call me Yamasen-Chan!
My bedroom is in need of a complete makeover, can you help me design it?

But first, can I tell you a bit of a secret?
I may not look like it, but I’m actually a hikikomori. Te he.
A hikikomori is like a hermit who shuts themself off from the world to live in isolation.
There are a lot of negative misconceptions about hikikomori being dirty slobs and living in messy rooms but that’s just not true.
Just because I’m a hikikomori doesn’t mean I can’t have a good looking room. In fact, I have even more reason to make my room look great, It’s my whole world after all!
I want my room to be like a one-stop hermit paradise with lots of entertainment and cute plushies and instant ramen...
Ooooh, I’m so excited!
Let’s get designing!
Wow, my room looks so amazing now!
I can’t wait to-
Huh! Oh no, Someones at the door!
What do I do?
He he he...
Um... so...

That was scary, I almost had to have a social interaction. 
Who knows what could have happened.
You may think it’s weird for me to hide in here, but I became a hikikomori because my social anxiety makes it really hard to talk to people.
Sometimes it can become a real problem. But that’s okay, we can just design here in the closet, right?
This place is cool too, right?
Maybe I should just live in here from now on...
Isn’t this new room so cozy?
Though it’s getting a bit hard to breathe...
Do you think the person at the door is gone? I’ll go check.
Phew, they’re gone. That was a close one.
Turns out it was just the postman leaving the mail. What a relief.
There’s a letter from my parents! Let’s see what it says...
My parents say I spent too much money on furniture. They’re cutting my allowance and aren’t going to pay my rent anymore...
Soooo, I had to leave my apartment but it’s not that big a deal. In fact, I think this will be good for me!
Now I’ll have to learn how to exist like a normal person out in the real world.
I had some money saved up and I bought an amazing used trailer home for me to live in. Now when people try to talk to me, I can just drive away from them without having to leave the comfort of home!
This new home may be small, but that also means it’s cute. How about we name it Trailer-Tan. Te he.
Trailer-Tan is even cuter now that it’s all decorated!
Living here is going to be so much-
Someone is at the door, you know what that means!
Wow, people sure are scary.
I think I may have gotten a bit carried away with my escape. I kept driving away until I ended up in the mountains with no gas.
But you know what, running out of gas was a happy accident because I found this: A brand new home!
A mountain cave is an ideal home for a Hikikomori. I’ll be far away from society and I’ll never have to worry about socializing with people ever again!
Plus this cave is spacious, which means there is so much room to design with!
Living here, I’ll be just like a zen monk, or like Buddha! I won’t have to talk to anyone or worry about my social anxiety and it’ll be so much fun!
This design is really great, but you know, I’ve been thinking...
About this cave and all...
There is still a chance that people will come here and try to socialize with me and that’s not a risk I should have to take. Just thinking about the possibility makes me anxious.
There must be a better way to live.
I can take things even further! I can leave society completely and never have to socialize at all! Then I’ll become the one true hikikomori!
I have an idea! Te he.
Burr, it sure is cold.

My new home is in the arctic!
Getting here sure was difficult, but now I’m completely separated from society!
The best part is that if someone tries to approach me, I’ll see them from miles away and I’ll have plenty of time to escape.
Burr, I’m still not sure what to do about this weather though.
But you know, having a bit of chills is worth it to not have to worry about social anxiety!
This little iceberg is so cute, perfect for designing!
This design is really great, but you know, I’ve been thinking...
Burr, it REALLY is cold...
It is worth it though right?
Maybe there’s a better way to live.

Oh, I know how to fix this. My time alone in the mountains helped me to look inward and find my true self. I realized that if I just meditate and look within myself, I can overcome my physical body and not feel cold at all!
If I can do that, living here will be perfect!
Let’s try it.
I finally figured it out! How to truly solve all my problems. Te he.
The solution was not just to leave society, but to leave the physical world as well!
From now on, I’ll live completely inside my mind and never have to worry about the real world ever again!
I’ve finally cured my social anxiety!
And on top of that, we have an infinite space to design with now. How fun!
Isn’t it great, I can design in here forever!

You know, I tried so hard in the past to be like a normal person but there was nothing I could do to make it work. My anxieties and abnormalities forced me into a state of isolation, but I’ve come to realize that that’s okay.
I’ve realized this really is the only way to live for a hikikomori like me.

Sure, I might get lonely from time to time, but I know now that it really is worth it. I finally cured myself of anxiety and can live comfortably like a normal person here inside the void beyond the physical world.
Thank you for being so understanding and helping me design such great homes. It’s a shame most of them didn’t work out better, but I’m fairly certain I can live at peace here for a long time.
Feel free to come and visit anytime.
Goodbye.
